attributes.additional_details: Uk government is doing nothing against important World problems mentioned are Climate change/ Global warming/ Ozone layer/ Greenhouse effect 9% (up 2%), Donald Trump 7% (new), Social apathy/ Lack of values/ Lack of empathy towards others/ Intolerance 6% (down 1%) and Government/ Politicians/ Political Unrest 5%.
attributes.background: Being looking to change a law or a behavior

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you’d like to happen. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
